system.requirements:
Tier 2; Strength 45, Berserk Charge 
Aptitudes: Strength, Offence
system.effect: When Character makes a Charge Action against a Target with a Size Trait Smaller than their own, they can make a +0 Opposed Strength Test against the target as a Free Action. If successful the target suffers -30 to Dodge or Parry the attack.
